sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Str.Upper function takes the string s and returns a string in which all the lower case letters are converted to upper case. For example, Str.Upper ("ABC123def") returns "ABC123DEF".
sections.mdown_content:
The **Str.Upper** function takes the string *s* and returns
a string in which all the lower case letters are converted to 
upper case. For example, Str.Upper ("ABC123def") returns
"ABC123DEF".

sections.title: Example
code:
var line : string
        loop
            put "Enter a line of text (empty to quit): " ..
            get line : *
            exit when line = ""
            put "The upper case version: ", Str.Upper (line)
        end loop
sections.raw_content: This program obtains lines of text from the user and outputs the lines converted to upper case.
sections.mdown_content:
This program obtains lines of text from the user and outputs the
lines converted to upper case.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Str.Upper, not by calling Upper.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling 
**Str.Upper**, not by calling **Upper**.
